page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The rectangle of land under consideration in the following twenty pages is almost entirely agricultural and woodland.It contains two villages, in the south east corner is Woodhall Spa,a medium sized village and in the north the tiny village of Stixwould. Most of the significant facts in the area are found in the south easterly square of the rectangle. The single most important factor in the area is the spa waters which have influenced it's development from the late nineteenth century to 1985.Their discovery gave birth to the village of Woodhall Spa and a brand new parish which was made to contain it.
